full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB CHEN GSANG BA CHEN PO'I TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES GRUB CHEN GSANG BA'I TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BGYIS @006B ZHES, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO YONGS PA BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS ZLA MA MCHIS PA, CHOS SRID KYI BDAG PO CHEN PO SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA MCHOG GI BKA' LUNG SPYI BOR NOS PA LA BRTEN, GANG GI ZHABS KHONGS SU GTOGS PA KHU RAL YONGS 'DZIN MKHAN PO NO MON HAN BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GIS SBYAR TE PHUL BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
